mrgda 0.8.1

  • Changelog

Source data query

query_src_dir.Rd

Use this to search for a character string across every source data domain including the name, label and contents of each domain.

query_src_dir(.src_directory, .string, .file_types = "detect")

Arguments

.src_directory

file path to the source data directory

.string

string to search for

.file_types

Type of files being read in (e.g. 'sas7bat'). The default ('detect') will determine file type based on the most occurring file type in .path.

Examples

path <- system.file("example-sdtm", package = "mrgda")

# Summarize source directory
query_src_dir(.src_directory = path, .string = "RACE")
#> ℹ Detected file type = 'xpt'
#> Reading in ae.xpt (6.88 KB)
#> ✔ /data/mrgda/inst/example-sdtm/ae.xpt
